Package model.player

package model.player
The model.player package contains classes related to player management in the Jackaroo game. This includes the core Player class, representing both human and CPU players, as well as the Marble class for managing player marbles on the board.

Key Classes:

  • Player - Represents a player with a hand of cards, marbles, and in-game actions.
  • Marble - Represents a marble belonging to a player, associated with a specific colour.

The Player class is designed to manage both human and CPU players, offering methods to handle cards, marbles, and player-specific logic.

  • Related Packages

    model
    The model package contains the core data models for the Jackaroo game.
    model.card
    The model.card package contains classes representing the cards used in the Jackaroo game.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CPU
    The CPU class represents a computer-controlled player in the game.
    Marble
    Represents a marble in the Jackaroo game.
    Player
    Represents a player in the Jackaroo game, holding a hand of cards, marbles, and managing the selected card and marbles for play.
